Package ca.mcgill.nalmer.splendormodels

Class Game

java.lang.Object
ca.mcgill.nalmer.splendormodels.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
eu.kartoffelquadrat.asyncrestlib.BroadcastContent
public final class Game extends Object implements eu.kartoffelquadrat.asyncrestlib.BroadcastContent
Represents the game board.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(List<ca.mcgill.nalmer.lsutilities.model.User> gameUsers, GameExtension ext, CardGeneratorInterface cardGenerator, ActionGeneratorInterface actionGenerator, String gameId)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      gameUsers - List of users.
      ext - Game extension.
      cardGenerator - Card generator.
      actionGenerator - Action generator.
      gameId - Game id.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if gameUsers, ext, cardGenerator, actionGenerator or gameId is null.
      RuntimeException - if gameUsers.size() is not between Constants.MIN_NUMBER_OF_PLAYERS and Constants.MAX_NUMBER_OF_PLAYERS inclusive, or if ext is GameExtension.BASE_ORIENT_TRADING_POSTS are cardGenerator did not generate all of them, or generated one of them twice.

    • getWinners

      public List<Player> getWinners()
      Gets the list of winners, or null if the game is not yet finished. This function returns an empty list in the extreme case where the game ended in a draw and there are no winners (possible if no player can play during a round).
      Returns:
      List of winners.
